This little app has one purpose:
 
Give your style of praying a new momentum! 
 
How?! It does not give you any advice or anything else. It simply vibrates. 
It passively vibrates every X minutes, whereas the repeat time is defined by you. The gist of the reminding - vibrating - is to motivate you to do a quick prayer, briefly speak with god and remind you of his presence in your life. 
Believe me! Jesus will change everything! 
 
To provide some comfort, the app has various adjustable preferences. 
- repeat time of vibration 
- duration of vibration 
- off-hours - sleep mode at night 
- own kind of vibration pattern 
- take a break button 
- shut down function 
- mind calls and silent/vibration mode 
- use acoustic notifications 
Once the app is started it does not need any adjustments anymore and keeps running until you tell it otherwise. It boots with your device, adjusts to your off-hours and offers a break-button if the reminding is not appropriate at the time.
Try out the blue buttons and sliders. They set up your individual configuration!
